original_text:
So he invited them in to be his guests.
The next day he rose and went away with them, and some of the brothers from Joppa accompanied him.

sentences.original_text: So he invited them in to be his guests.
and some of the brothers from Joppa accompanied him.
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 욥바에서 온 형제 몇 사람이 그를 동행했습니다.
